# Focus Launcher Private

> A privacy-first, distraction-free Android launcher for Android 14/15

Minimize distractions, follow-through on your intentions, and regain control of your phone. Focus Launcher is an Android app that counteracts the addictive design of your phone.

**âœ¨ This version has been enhanced with privacy-first improvements generated by Claude AI** to ensure zero tracking and full Android 14/15 compatibility.


![480x](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30163055/145687590-8fe2d7b2-c315-42b2-9365-40b81d88d1f5.png)


## Get the app
[Download from the PlayStore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.focuslauncher)

## ğŸ”’ Privacy Guarantees

This enhanced version removes ALL tracking and data collection:

- âŒ **No Firebase** - Zero analytics or crash reporting to Google
- âŒ **No Sentry** - No external error tracking
- âŒ **No MailChimp** - No email collection
- âŒ **No Ads** - Completely ad-free
- âŒ **No Network Calls** - Unless explicitly initiated by you
- âœ… **All data stays on your device** - 100% local storage
- âœ… **Open source and auditable** - Every line of code is public
- âœ… **Minimal permissions** - Only essential launcher permissions

[Read our Privacy Policy](docs/PRIVACY_POLICY.md) | [See Permissions Explained](docs/PERMISSIONS.md)

## ğŸ› ï¸ Building from Source

Want to build the app yourself? It's easy!

### Prerequisites
- **Java Development Kit (JDK) 17** or higher
- **Android Studio** (recommended) or Android SDK Command Line Tools
- **Git**

### Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/Gutssudo/focus-launcher-privacy.git
cd focus-launcher-privacy/MiniumApps

# Build debug APK
./gradlew assembleDebug

# Or build release APK
./gradlew assembleRelease
```

**Output location:**
- Debug: `MiniumApps/launcher3/build/outputs/apk/debug/launcher3-debug.apk`
- Release: `MiniumApps/launcher3/build/outputs/apk/release/launcher3-release.apk`

### Detailed Instructions

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md#building-from-source) for:
- Complete build instructions
- Signing configuration
- Running tests
- Troubleshooting common issues

### System Requirements

- **compileSdk**: 35 (Android 15)
- **targetSdk**: 34 (Android 14)
- **minSdk**: 21 (Android 5.0)
- **Gradle**: 8.2.2
- **Kotlin**: 1.9.22

## About Us
We're an open-source community that believes our attention is worth protecting. We have deep roots in building humane technology and open-source.

**This privacy-enhanced fork** is maintained by the community with improvements generated by Claude AI to ensure zero tracking and maximum privacy.

### Privacy-First Development

When contributing, ensure:
- âŒ No tracking libraries (Firebase, Sentry, etc.)
- âŒ No external data transmission
- âŒ No unnecessary permissions
- âœ… All data stays local
- âœ… Code is auditable and well-documented
